description:
After being freed from the Facility, Yusei risks being re-incarcerated when he tries to take back his Duel Runner from Sector Security`s security vault.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gut getrickst, ist halb gewonnen - Teil 1
Tokushu Tsuiseki Deck Futatabi: Torimodose Nakama to no Kizuna
المجموعة المميزة تعود: عودة العلاقة مع الأصدقاء
特殊追跡デッキ再び 取り戻せ仲間との絆
